extension.name: Sagenda booking and scheduling calendar
extension.author: Iteration.info SARL
extension.description: A Booking Calendar for your Joomla Website

field.name: sagendaToken
field.label: Token
field.description: Please paste here the token that you can found on your dashboard : https://sagenda.net/Dashboard

field.name: sagendaWeekStartsOn
field.label: Week start on
field.description: Please select which day your week should start on your calendar.

field.name: sagendaDateFormat
field.label: Date format
field.description:
Define the format of date you want,
YYYY-MM-DD for 1981-10-25
DD.MM.YY for 25.10.1981

field.name: sagendaTimeFormat
field.label: Time format
field.description:
Define the format of time you want,
HH:mm for 18:00
hh:mm A for 06:00 PM

field.name: note11
field.label: You will find the complete list of possible date and time format here : https://momentjs.com/docs/#/displaying/
